	.media-page-chat-aside-chat.collapsed .media-page-chat-aside-chat-wrapper-fixed {

		display: flex;
		align-items: center;
		justify-content: center;

	.media-page-chat-container-toggle-btn:hover {

	[data-theme=dark] .media-page-chat-container-toggle-btn:hover {

	.media-page-chat-container-toggle-btn.collapsed {
		background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);

		transform: rotate(180deg);
		left: -42px;
	}
	.media-page-chat-container-toggle-btn.collapsed:hover {
		background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.22);
		transform: rotate(180deg);
	}
	.media-page-chat-theater-container {

	}
	.media-page-chat-theater-container.transition {
		transition: width .2s ease;
	}

	display: block;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;

	text-align: center;

	background: #fff;

	background: #74a642;

	margin-top: -3.5rem;
	padding:0;
	border-top: none;

	padding: 1rem 0;
}.mediaList-item{
	padding: 0.75rem 0;
}
.mediaList-link {
	display: flex;
	overflow: hidden;
	align-items: flex-start;
}
.mediaList-link:hover{
	text-decoration:none;
}
.mediaList-link.size-large,
.mediaList-link.size-xlarge {
	flex-direction: column;
	align-items: flex-start;
}
.mediaList-image-div{
	width: 160px;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	margin-right: 10px;
	position:relative;
	line-height: 0;
	overflow: hidden;
	border-radius: 0.8rem;
}
.mediaList-image-div.size-large,
.mediaList-image-div.size-xlarge{
	width: 100%;
	margin-right: 0;
}
.mediaList-image-div.size-small{
	width:35%;
}
.mediaList-image{
    display: block;
	width:100%;
	aspect-ratio: 16/9;
	object-fit: fill;
	border-radius: 0.8rem;
}

img.mediaList-image{
	background: #f3f5f8;
	color: transparent;
}

.mediaList-image-live::after,
.mediaList-image-upcoming:after {
    content: '';
    display: block;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border-radius: 0.8rem;
    border: 3px solid;
}

.mediaList-image-live::after {
    border-color: #f23160;
}

.mediaList-image-upcoming:after {
	border-color: #ec0;
}

.mediaList-image-live .mediaList-image,
.mediaList-image-upcoming .mediaList-image {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 2px;
}

.mediaList-heading{
	font-size: 13px;
	font-weight: 600;
	margin: 0.5rem 0;
	line-height: 1.25;
	max-height: 2.2rem;
	overflow: hidden;
}
.mediaList-heading.size-xlarge {
	font-size: 2rem;
	line-height: 2.2rem;
	max-height: 2.2rem;
	margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}
.mediaList-heading.size-large {
	margin-top: 7px;
	font-size: 1.2rem;
	line-height: 1.5rem;
	max-height: 1.5rem;
}
.mediaList-heading.size-xlarge,
.mediaList-heading.size-large {
	white-space: nowrap; display: block; text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
.mediaList-heading.size-medium, .mediaList-heading.size-small {
	max-height: 2.5rem;
	white-space: normal; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
}
.mediaList-by{
	position:relative;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	line-height: 1.1;
}
.mediaList-by-image{
	left:0;
	margin-right: 7px;
}
.mediaList-by-heading{
	font-weight:normal;
	margin:0;
	font-size: 12px;
	color: #495a6a;
	display: inline;
	-webkit-line-clamp: 1;
    display: -webkit-box;
    max-height: 13px;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.mediaList-rumbles,
.mediaList-earnings,
.mediaList-liveCount {
	display: block;
	color:#587f33;
}
.mediaList-liveCount {
	margin-top: -3px;
	color: #f23160;
}
.mediaList-by.size-small .mediaList-rumbles,
.mediaList-by.size-small .mediaList-earnings,
.mediaList-by.size-small .mediaList-liveCount{
	font-size: 0.8rem;
}
.mediaList-by.size-large .mediaList-earnings,
.mediaList-by.size-xlarge .mediaList-earnings,
.mediaList-by.size-large .mediaList-liveCount,
.mediaList-by.size-xlarge .mediaList-liveCount {
	display: inline;
}

.mediaList-timestamp{white-space: nowrap}

.mediaList-duration,.mediaList-live,.mediaList-upcoming{
	position:absolute;
	bottom:7px;
	right:7px;
	color:#ddd;
	background:#061726;
	padding:3px 8px;
	font-size:0.8rem;
	font-weight: 700;
	line-height: initial;
}
.mediaList-duration {
	-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	border-radius: 25px;
	overflow: hidden; /* no blur outside of radius */
}
.mediaList-live,
.mediaList-upcoming{
	border-radius: 25px;
	bottom: 11px;
	right: 11px;
}
.mediaList-live{
	color:#fff;
	background:#f23160;
}
.mediaList-upcoming{
	background: #ec0;
	color: #000;
}
.mediaList-info { width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; }

(function() {
    console.log('new vote')
    $$.rumblesVote={
        attach:function(elm){
            console.log('elm: ', elm);
            var buttons = ['[data-js="rumble_vote_up"], [data-js="rumble_vote_down"]', elm];
            $$.addClick(buttons, function(){
                var clicked = this;
                if (clicked.classList.contains('active')) clicked = null;

                $$.rumblesVote.updateButtons(buttons, clicked);
                $$.servicePost('user.rumbles', {
                    type: elm.getAttribute('data-type'),
                    id: elm.getAttribute('data-id'),
                    vote: clicked ? clicked.getAttribute('data-vote') : 0
                }, function() {

                    if(this.data) {
                        var rumbles_count_el = elm.querySelector(".rumbles-count");
                        if(rumbles_count_el) {
                            elm.querySelector(".rumbles-count").textContent = this.data.score_formatted;
                        }

                        if(this.data.num_votes_up !== undefined && this.data.num_votes_down !== undefined) {
                            var up_votes_el = elm.querySelector('[data-js="rumbles_up_votes"]');
                            var down_votes_el = elm.querySelector('[data-js="rumbles_down_votes"]');

                            if(up_votes_el) up_votes_el.textContent = this.data.num_votes_up_formatted || this.data.num_votes_up;
                            if(down_votes_el) down_votes_el.textContent = this.data.num_votes_down_formatted || this.data.num_votes_down;

                            var rating_bar_fill_el = elm.querySelector('[data-js="rating_bar_fill"]');
                            if(rating_bar_fill_el) {
                                var num_votes_divisor = this.data.num_votes_up + this.data.num_votes_down;
                                var num_votes_width = num_votes_divisor > 0 ? (this.data.num_votes_up / num_votes_divisor) * 100 : 50;
                                rating_bar_fill_el.style.width = num_votes_width + '%';
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        $$.removeClass(clicked, 'active')
                    }
                });
            });
        },
        updateButtons:function(buttons, clicked) {
            $$.each($$.query(buttons), function() {
                this === clicked ? $$.addClass(this, 'active') : $$.removeClass(this, 'active');
            });
        }
    };

    var parent = (this != window && typeof this.html == "object") ? this.html : null;

    $$.each($$.query('[data-js="rumble_vote_pill"]', parent), function(){
        $$.rumblesVote.attach(this);
    });
}).call(this);

	//
	// Resize videoFooter video action buttons
	//
	// update video action buttons when the container size is changed
	function resetAllVideoActionButtons(){
		var video_action_button_visible_location_els = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-js="video_action_button_visible_location"]'))
		var video_action_button_sub_menu_location_els = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-js="video_action_button_sub_menu_location"]'))
		var sub_menu_button_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_action_subm_menu_button"]')

		// hide sub menu button
		sub_menu_button_el.style.display = 'none';
		// show all default visible buttons
		video_action_button_visible_location_els.forEach( el => {
			el.style.display = 'block'
		})
		// hide all sub menu buttons
		video_action_button_sub_menu_location_els.forEach( el => {
			el.style.display = 'none'
		})
	}

	// calculate which buttons can display and update state
	function calculateVideoActionButtons(){
		var video_action_button_visible_location_els = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-js="video_action_button_visible_location"]'))
		var video_action_button_sub_menu_location_els = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-js="video_action_button_sub_menu_location"]'))
		var sub_menu_button_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_action_subm_menu_button"]')
		var hidden_button_count = 0;

		// check the bounderies
		function elementDoesNotFit(el){
			var sub_menu_button_width = sub_menu_button_el.offsetWidth;
			var parent_rect = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_footer_container"]').getBoundingClientRect();
			var parent_rect_right = parent_rect.right - sub_menu_button_width;
			var el_rect_right = el.getBoundingClientRect().right;
			var el_does_not_fit = el_rect_right > parent_rect_right;

			return el_does_not_fit;
		}

		function setButtonsToSubMenu(){
			var hidden_buttons_pos = hidden_button_count * -1;
			var hidden_button_els = video_action_button_visible_location_els.slice(hidden_buttons_pos);

			// set state for hidden buttons
			hidden_button_els.forEach( el => {
				var hidden_button_type = el.dataset.type;
				var matching_sub_menu_button = video_action_button_sub_menu_location_els.find( sub_menu_el => {
					return sub_menu_el.dataset.type == hidden_button_type
				})

				// set button visible in sub menu
				matching_sub_menu_button.style.display = 'block'
				// hide main button
				el.style.display = 'none';
			})
		}

		function setButtonsToVideoFooter(){
			var hidden_buttons_pos = hidden_button_count * -1;
			var visible_button_els = video_action_button_visible_location_els.slice(0, hidden_buttons_pos);

			// set state for visible buttons
			visible_button_els.forEach( el => {
				var visible_button_type = el.dataset.type;
				var matching_sub_menu_button = video_action_button_sub_menu_location_els.find( button_el => {
					return button_el.dataset.type == visible_button_type
				})

				// set button hidden in sub menu
				matching_sub_menu_button.style.display = 'none'
				// show main button
				el.style.display = 'block';
			})
		}

		// temorarily set all the buttons to visible in order to calculate the visible buttons
		sub_menu_button_el.style.display = "block"
		video_action_button_visible_location_els.forEach( el => {
			el.style.display = "block"
			if(elementDoesNotFit(el)) hidden_button_count += 1;
		})

		// update state of buttons
		if(hidden_button_count > 0){
			setButtonsToSubMenu();
			setButtonsToVideoFooter();
		} else {
			resetAllVideoActionButtons()
		}
	}

	function debounce(func, delay) {
		let timer;

		return function (...args) {
			clearTimeout(timer);

			timer = setTimeout(() => {
			func(...args);
			}, delay);
		};
	}

	const debouncedResizeCallback = debounce(entries => {
		entries.forEach(entry => {
			var BREAKPOINT_MOBILE_700 = 700
			if(window.innerWidth > BREAKPOINT_MOBILE_700){
				calculateVideoActionButtons()
			} else {
				resetAllVideoActionButtons()
			}
		});
	}, 200);

	// wait for container resize
	var video_footer_container_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_footer_container"]');
	var resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(debouncedResizeCallback);
	resizeObserver.observe(video_footer_container_el)

	//
	// Toggle open and close sub menu
	//
	var sub_menu_button_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_action_subm_menu_button"]')
	var video_action_sub_menu_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_action_sub_menu"]')
	sub_menu_button_el.addEventListener('click', () => {
		video_action_sub_menu_el.classList.toggle('open')
	})

	document.addEventListener("click", e => {
		if(e.target !== video_action_sub_menu_el && e.target !== sub_menu_button_el && e.target.parentNode !== sub_menu_button_el) {
			video_action_sub_menu_el.classList.remove('open');
		}
	})

$$.handlePlayerApi = function(api) {
	var theaterModeEnabled = false,
		is_theater_mode = false,
		body = document.body,
		THEATER_MODE_CLASS = 'theater-mode',
		resizeMode = api.getResizeMode(),
		p = $$.query('#vid_' + api.getCurrentVideo().id)[0],
		d=$$.query('#videoPlayer')[0],
		dt = $$.query('#theaterVideoPlayer')[0],
		ps = $$.query('#player-spacer')[0],
		media_info_el = $$.query('[data-js="media_info"]')[0]
		media_theater_info_container_el = $$.query('[data-js="media_theater_info_container"]')[0]
		media_container_el = $$.query('[data-js="media_container"]')[0];

		MIN_THEATER_MODE_WIDTH = 900;
	theaterModeEnabled = window.innerWidth >= MIN_THEATER_MODE_WIDTH;

	api.on("theaterMode", function(do_theater_mode) {
		is_theater_mode = do_theater_mode;
		var media_default_main_sidebar_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_default_main_sidebar"]')

		// NOTE: This will fire regardless of the current page width!
		if ( do_theater_mode ) {
			body.classList.add(THEATER_MODE_CLASS);
			dt.appendChild(p);
			media_theater_info_container_el.appendChild(media_info_el);
			api.setResizeMode('full');
			// update sidebar on default vod layout for theater mode
			if(media_default_main_sidebar_el){
				media_default_main_sidebar_el.classList.add('theatermode-shift-related')
			}
		} else {
			body.classList.remove(THEATER_MODE_CLASS);
			d.appendChild(p);
			media_container_el.appendChild(media_info_el);
			api.setResizeMode(resizeMode);
			// update sidebar on default vod layout for theater mode
			if(media_default_main_sidebar_el){
				media_default_main_sidebar_el.classList.remove('theatermode-shift-related')
			}
		}
	});

	// Tell player to show Theater Mode button
	if (theaterModeEnabled) {api.sendEvent('enableTheaterMode')}

	window.addEventListener('resize', function (event) {
		if (theaterModeEnabled && window.innerWidth < MIN_THEATER_MODE_WIDTH) {
			api.sendEvent('disableTheaterMode');
			theaterModeEnabled = false;
		} else if (!theaterModeEnabled && window.innerWidth >= MIN_THEATER_MODE_WIDTH) {
			api.sendEvent('enableTheaterMode');
			theaterModeEnabled = true;
		}
	});

	$$.addClick('[data-js="media_engage_share"]', function() {
		var start_time = 0;

		if( this.dataset.isShareableWithStartTime ) {
			start_time = parseInt(api.getCurrentTime());
		}

		$$.serviceGet('media.share', {video:"17n34y",start:start_time});
	});

	api.isTheaterEnabled = function(){
		return theaterModeEnabled;
	};

	$$.providers.send('player', api);

	if ($$.query('[data-js="media_video_action_embed"]').length) {
		$$.addClick('[data-js="media_video_action_embed"]',function(){
			var start_time = 0;
			if( this.dataset.isShareableWithStartTime ) {
				start_time = parseInt(api.getCurrentTime());
			}

			$$.serviceGet('media.embed',{video:"17n34y",start:start_time});
		});
	}
}

$$.onDomReady(function(){
	var video_comments_el = $$.query('#video-comments')[0];

	if ( !video_comments_el ) return;

	$$.serviceGet("comment.list",{video:"17n34y"}, function() {
		video_comments_el.textContent = "";
		video_comments_el.appendChild(this.html);
	});

	// logic for handling mobile drawer
	function initMobileDrawer(){
		// state variables
		var mobile_drawer_items_mounted = false; /* used for resizing window and mounting elements to drawer */
		var mobile_drawer_mounted_item;
		var mobile_drawer_position = 'closed';
		var is_resize = false;
		var start_y_pos = 0;
		var mobile_breakpoint = 900;

		// elements variables
		var media_page_mobile_drawer = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer"]');
		var media_page_mobile_drawer_content_wrapper = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_content_wrapper"]');
		var media_page_mobile_drawer_resize_handle_container = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_resize_handle_container"]');
		var media_page_mobile_drawer_comments_header = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_comments_header"]');
		var media_page_mobile_drawer_open_button_els = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_open_button"]'));
		var media_page_mobile_drawer_close_button_els = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_close_button"]'));

		var comments_section_el = document.getElementById('video-comments')
		var chat_section_el = document.querySelector('section.chat')

		var media_page_chat_aside_chat_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_chat_aside_chat"]');
		var media_page_chat_container_toggle_btn = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_chat_container_toggle_btn"]');
		var media_page_chat_aside_chat_container = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_chat_aside_chat_container"]');
		var media_page_comments_container = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_comments_container"]');
		var chat_header_live_info_container_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="chat_header_live_info_container"]')
		var video_header_live_info_container_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_header_live_info_container"]')
		var video_live_info_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="video_live_info"]')

		var media_page_mobile_drawer_content_comments = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_content_comments"]');
		var media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat = document.querySelector('[data-js="media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat"]');

		var video_player_el = document.querySelector('#videoPlayer')
		var app_header_el = document.querySelector('[data-js="app_header"]')

		//
		// Drawer positions
		//
		function setDrawerOpenPosition(){
				// mobile_drawer_position = 'open';
				// get the position of the bottom edge of the video player
				var video_bottom_edge = video_player_el.getBoundingClientRect().bottom
				var drawer_height = window.innerHeight - video_bottom_edge

				media_page_mobile_drawer.style.height = drawer_height + 'px';
				media_page_mobile_drawer_content_wrapper.style.height = drawer_height + 'px';
		}
		function setDrawerFullPosition(){
			// mobile_drawer_position = 'full';
			// get the position of the bottom edge of the app header
			var app_header_bottom_edge = app_header_el.getBoundingClientRect().bottom
			var drawer_height = window.innerHeight - app_header_bottom_edge


			media_page_mobile_drawer.style.height = drawer_height + 'px';
			media_page_mobile_drawer_content_wrapper.style.height = drawer_height + 'px';

		}
		function setDrawerClosedPoisition(){
			// mobile_drawer_position = 'closed';
			// the css heights are set to 0px, just unset the inline styles
			media_page_mobile_drawer.style.height = drawer_height = '';
			media_page_mobile_drawer_content_wrapper.style.height = '';

			if(mobile_drawer_mounted_item == 'chat'){
				// move watching now count from chat header -> video header
				video_header_live_info_container_el.appendChild(video_live_info_el)
			}
		}

		// update the current drawer position based on mobile_drawer_position
		// setup this way so we can handle drag resizing and the mobile browser bar
		function updateCurrentDrawerPosition(){
			if(mobile_drawer_position == 'open'){
				setDrawerOpenPosition()
			}

			if(mobile_drawer_position == 'full'){
				setDrawerFullPosition()
			}

			if(mobile_drawer_position == 'closed'){
				setDrawerClosedPoisition()
			}
		}

		// handle mobile browser url bar collapse or canceled resize drag
		// window.addEventListener('resize', updateCurrentDrawerPosition);

		//
		// resize drawer
		//

		/*
			disabling the drag to resize feature temporarliy until we implement a solution that does not
			cause a refresh when swiping down to close the drawer
		*/
		// media_page_mobile_drawer_resize_handle_container.addEventListener('touchstart', handleResize);
		// media_page_mobile_drawer_resize_handle_container.addEventListener('mousedown', handleResize);
		function handleResize(e){
			// set state to resize
			is_resize = true;

			start_y_pos = e.type === 'touchstart' ? e.touches[0].clientY : e.clientY;;

			// remove transition from container so it moves smoothly
			media_page_mobile_drawer.style.transition = "none";

			function stopResize(){
				// set state to resize
				is_resize = false;
				// unset drawer transition inline styles
				media_page_mobile_drawer.style.transition = "";

				// update the drawer position
				updateCurrentDrawerPosition()

				// remove event listeners
				window.removeEventListener('touchmove', updateResize)
				window.removeEventListener('touchend', stopResize);
				window.removeEventListener('mousemove', updateResize)
				window.removeEventListener('mouseup', stopResize);
			}

			function updateResize(e){
				if(!is_resize) return;

				var eventYPos = e.type === 'touchmove' ? e.touches[0].clientY : e.clientY;
				var min_move_distance = 75 /*  minimum pxl distance to move to either expand or collapse */
				var drawer_top_pos_update = window.innerHeight - eventYPos;
				var current_y_pos = eventYPos;

				// move the container size while dragging
				media_page_mobile_drawer.style.height = drawer_top_pos_update + 'px';
				media_page_mobile_drawer_content_wrapper.style.height = drawer_top_pos_update + 'px';

				if(start_y_pos - current_y_pos > min_move_distance){
					// detect move up
					mobile_drawer_position = 'full'
					stopResize()
					// setDrawerFullPosition()
				}

				if(current_y_pos - start_y_pos > min_move_distance){
					// detect move down
					if(mobile_drawer_position == 'full'){
						mobile_drawer_position = 'open'
						stopResize()
						// setDrawerOpenPosition()
					}
					else if(mobile_drawer_position == 'open'){
						mobile_drawer_position = 'closed'
						stopResize()
						// setDrawerClosedPoisition()
					}
				}
			}

			// add event listeners
			window.addEventListener('touchmove', updateResize);
			window.addEventListener('touchend', stopResize);
			window.addEventListener('mousemove', updateResize);
			window.addEventListener('mouseup', stopResize);
		}

		//
		// manage drawer content
		//

		function setCommentsDrawer(){
			mobile_drawer_mounted_item = 'comments'
			media_page_mobile_drawer_content_comments.style.display = 'block';
			media_page_mobile_drawer_comments_header.style.display = '';
			// check for desktop view, scroll chat into view
			if(window.innerWidth > mobile_breakpoint){
				const yOffset = -100;
				const y = comments_section_el.getBoundingClientRect().top + window.pageYOffset + yOffset;
				window.scrollTo({ top: y, behavior: 'smooth' });
			}
		}

		function setChatDrawer(){
			mobile_drawer_mounted_item = 'chat'
			if(media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat){
				media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat.style.display = 'block';
				// move watching now count to chat header
				chat_header_live_info_container_el.appendChild(video_live_info_el)
			}
		}

		function openDrawer(type){
			// reset both containers to display none - conditional check because chat is not on each media page
			media_page_mobile_drawer_content_comments.style.display = 'none';
			media_page_mobile_drawer_comments_header.style.display = 'none';
			if(media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat) media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat.style.display = 'none';

			mobile_drawer_position = 'open'
			updateCurrentDrawerPosition()

			if(type == "comments"){
				setCommentsDrawer()
			}
			if(type == "chat"){
				setChatDrawer()
			}
		}

		// handle opening chat by default
		window.addEventListener('load', openChatMobileAsDefault)
		function openChatMobileAsDefault(){
			if(window.innerWidth < mobile_breakpoint && mobile_drawer_items_mounted == true && media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat){
				openDrawer('chat')
			}
		}

		// handle opening mobile drawer
		media_page_mobile_drawer_open_button_els.forEach( el => {
			el.addEventListener('click', function(){
				openDrawer(el.dataset.type)
			})
		})

		// handle closing drawer
		media_page_mobile_drawer_close_button_els.forEach( el => {
			el.addEventListener('click', () => {
				mobile_drawer_position = 'closed'
				updateCurrentDrawerPosition()
			})
		})

		// handle mounting elements on resize and for initial load
		window.addEventListener('resize', mountForMobile)

		function mountForMobile(){
			if(window.innerWidth < mobile_breakpoint && mobile_drawer_items_mounted == false){
				// mount chat and comments to mobile containers
				media_page_mobile_drawer_content_comments?.appendChild(comments_section_el);
				media_page_mobile_drawer_content_chat?.appendChild(chat_section_el);
				mobile_drawer_items_mounted = true;

				// add event listener for handling mobile browser url bar
				window.addEventListener('resize', updateCurrentDrawerPosition);
			}
			if(window.innerWidth >= mobile_breakpoint && mobile_drawer_items_mounted == true){
				// mount chat and comments to default desktop containers
				media_page_comments_container?.appendChild(comments_section_el);

				// reset the state for aside chat
				// replicating this logic from chat dock.js
				// handling it here because this is where the drawer is handled
				if(media_page_chat_aside_chat_el) media_page_chat_aside_chat_el.style.display = 'block';
				media_page_chat_aside_chat_container?.appendChild(chat_section_el);
				media_page_chat_aside_chat_container?.appendChild(media_page_chat_container_toggle_btn);
				mobile_drawer_items_mounted = false;

				// remove event listener for handling mobile browser url bar
				window.removeEventListener('resize', updateCurrentDrawerPosition);

				// set drawer to closed state
				mobile_drawer_position = 'closed'
				updateCurrentDrawerPosition()
			}
		}

		// call to check on page load
		mountForMobile()
	}

	initMobileDrawer();

});

$$.addClick('.header-search-submit',function(e){
	var i=$$.getByClass('header-search-field'),
		v=i.value.trim();

	e.preventDefault();
	if(!$$.isVisible(i)){
		$$.togglePopShow(e, [i,$$.getByClass('header-search')]);
		i.focus();
	}else{
		if ( v == "" ) {
			i.focus();
			return false;
		}

		var submit_button = e.target;

		if(/^\/user\//g.test(location.pathname)){
			submit_button.setAttribute("disabled", "");
			location = location.pathname + "?q="+encodeURIComponent(v);
			return false;
		}

		submit_button.setAttribute("disabled", "");
		location = "/search/all?q="+encodeURIComponent(v);
	}
	return false;
